body: Since the whole tetris series for walls has been edited there has been mobs spawning in. Are they suppose to be there or what? I want to understand.
body_tagged: Since the whole tetris series for walls has been edited there has been mobs spawning in. Are they suppose to be there or what? I want to understand.
title: Are mobs suppose to be on?(walls)

replies.body: I do not know personally but I think you deserve an answer
replies.body_tagged: I do not know personally but I think you deserve an answer

replies.body: Thanks Awarrior, I just asked a mod on the server and said the map makers added them on but I don't see them anymore.  I'm think mobs is a cool idea but there was an odd spawning of them in places, like two creepers in a cave together.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks Awarrior, I just asked a mod on the server and said the map makers added them on but I don't see them anymore.  I'm think mobs is a cool idea but there was an odd spawning of them in places, like two creepers in a cave together.
